Package org.knime.core.webui.node.dialog.defaultdialog.widget.choices.impl

Class PersistentAsyncChoicesAdder

java.lang.Object
org.knime.core.webui.node.dialog.defaultdialog.widget.choices.impl.PersistentAsyncChoicesAdder
All Implemented Interfaces:
AsyncChoicesAdder
public final class PersistentAsyncChoicesAdder extends Object implements AsyncChoicesAdder
This is a decorator for the AsyncChoicesAdder which is used in cases where an added choice needs to be kept indefinitely regardless of the number of times it was already retrieved (e.g. when inside an array layout).
Author:
Paul BÃ¤rnreuther

      public org.knime.core.webui.node.dialog.defaultdialog.widget.choices.impl.ChoicesFutureHolder addChoices(String choicesProviderClassName, Callable<Object[]> choicesCallable)

      choicesCallable - to retrieve the choices

      the stored representation of the choices. This is a package scoped class as it should only be used for creating decorators of this interface.
